videos.title: Top 6 Books to Read on Finance & Business
videos.description: Watch Shashank Udupa​ reveal his top 6 must-read books for business and finance. Tune in to find out!

videos.title: Banks Suit UP! The Tatas and Birlas are coming for your Money!
videos.description: Make the trend your friend with tactical advice and insights from Shashank Udupa​.

videos.title: Burger King IPO with @Shashank Udupa​ ft. Dr. Elson
videos.description: In this episode, watch Shashank Udupa​along with Dr. Elson break down the recent Burger King IPO. Disclaimer: We encourage all investors to use the information on the channel as a resource only and should further do their own research on all featured companies, stocks, sectors, markets and information presented on the channel. Nothing published in this video should be considered as investment advice.

videos.title: Investing In Your 20s Simplified - 2021 | Episode 1
videos.description: In today's episode of World of Finance, we simplify investing for all you 20-year-olds out there. Your 20s are a time for you to start thinking about your future. It's a time where you should start investing but without a job that may be difficult. Today @Shashank Udupa​ will be giving you important tips and tricks so you can secure your financial future. This is an episode you don't want to miss. Watch now!

videos.title: Investing in Your 20s Simplified | How to Find Growth Stocks with smallcase - Episode 2 | 2021
videos.description: Investing seems intimidating and difficult. It's something that we all should do to grow our wealth but can seem risky. In today's episode of World of Finance, we talk about smallcase and investment options for everyone. @Shashank Udupa​ creates his own smallcases and teaches you how to adjust them to fit your budget and risk. This is one episode that'll greatly help your investment journey. Watch now!

videos.title: Investing In 20s Simplified | Top 3 Tools For Fundamental Analysis Of Growth Stocks - Ep. 3 | 2021
videos.description: Picking stocks can be done in a lot of ways. But businesses and companies are based in fundamentals.  These principles can help  you choose the best from the rest. In today's episode, @Shashank Udupa​ looks at 3 different ways to analyze stocks. The different rules behind stock analysis and more! This brings an end to our three-part series on trading, so be sure to watch this!

videos.title: What To Expect From Budget 2021? (And Why You Should Care)
videos.description: The finance minister's announcement that budget 2021 will be like no other has created a lot of excitement among citizens. Citizens hope and expect a lot from the government. However, there are undeniable places the government will have to spend. On Healthcare, Infrastructure, Market stimulus, etc. There is going to be a lot to look forward to. Watch now to take a look at the expectations of Indian citizens from the Union Budget 2021 in today's episode of World of Finance with @Shashank Udupa​

videos.title: Budget 2021 India - Is it good for you?
videos.description: The Budget 2021 was set to be the most promising one for India. A lot was on the line from coming back from a negative GDP to battling COVID and political pressure this was a budget that needed to be steady and not rock the boat. The Indian economy was hit hard last year and this budget had a lot on the line. Last week we put out a video on the expectations of the Budget. Today we'll be discussing the Budget 2021. Tune into find on today's episode of World of Finance with @Shashank Udupa​

videos.title: Bitcoin. Boom or Bubble?
videos.description: On today's Tuesday Finance Live, Shashank Udupa dives deep into the world of #Bitcoin​ and #Cryptocurrency​. Watch as he explains the sudden rise in value for Bitcoin and what this could mean for the future of crypto.

videos.title: Elon Buys Bitcoin, Dogecoin Up - What's Happening?
videos.description: Elon Musk has gotten a reputation for supporting, promoting and raising crypto more than ever this past year. Lately he's been tweeting a tonne about Doge Coin. But this move by his company Tesla may be his  biggest show of support for crypto yet. Yesterday Feb 9th, Tesla invested a massive 1.5 billion in bitcoin. He's also gone on the record saying they will accept the coin as payment in the future as well. In today's episode of World of Finance with @Shashank Udupa​ , we talk about why this is such a big deal and what this could mean for cryptocurrency in the future.

videos.title: Back to Basics - Let's Begin!
videos.description: The stock market has been weird lately and what better time to brush up on the fundamentals. In today's video we dive back into the basics of stock market

videos.title: Top Personal Finance Rules To Follow in 2021
videos.description: Personal finance is a term that covers managing your money as well as saving and investing. It is about meeting personal financial goals, whether it’s having enough for short-term financial needs, planning for retirement, or saving for your child’s college education. Watch the entire video to learn more.
